medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain started as epigastric pain two days prior to admission and eventually migrated to the right lower quadrant (RLQ). Patient had associated nausea, but denied vomiting and diarrhea. Last bowel movement was one day prior to admission.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Dysthymia, left hip fracture, left inguinal hernia
